eugene.neighborhoods: Downtown, Whiteaker, South Eugene, West University
eugene.meetingHighlights: University-area meetings mixed with long-standing neighborhood groups; active lunchtime and evening meetings.
eugene.transitInfo: Lane Transit District (LTD) provides bus service across Eugene and Springfield; Eugene Airport (EUG) for regional flights.

salem.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Salem, South Salem, Northeast Salem, Fairmount, Westgate
salem.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday attendance and a mix of study and open discussion groups.
salem.transitInfo: Cherriots buses provide local transit; Salem Municipal Airport and proximity to Portland for broader air travel.

portland.neighborhoods: Downtown, Pearl District, Nob Hill, Hawthorne, Alberta Arts District, Southeast
portland.meetingHighlights: Extensive and diverse meeting offerings across neighborhoods with many specialty meetings, speaker nights, and active newcomer outreach.
portland.transitInfo: TriMet buses, MAX light rail, and WES commuter rail serve the metro; Portland International Airport (PDX) for national and international flights.

bend.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old Bend, Southwest Bend, NorthWest Crossing
bend.meetingHighlights: Outdoor-friendly and community meetings with an active newcomer presence and several evening options.
bend.transitInfo: Cascade East Transit and local bus services; Roberts Field (RDM) for regional flights.

medford.meetingHighlights: Regional meetings serving Rogue Valley with steady attendance and both daytime and evening groups.
medford.transitInfo: RVTD buses and local transit; Rogue Valley Internationalâ€“Medford Airport for regional flights.
